title: Trailer for the 2022-2023 NBA Season!
description:
Introducing The Ringer NBA Show's 2022-2023 slate: 'Real Ones' with Logan Murdock and Raja Bell on Mondays and Thursdays, ‘The Answer’ with Seerat Sohi and J. Kyle Mann on Tuesdays, 'Group Chat' with Justin Verrier, Rob Mahoney, and Wosny Lambre and ‘Weekends with Wos’ with Wosny Lambre every Friday to wrap up the week.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: The Ringer
